name: user-loyalty
description: Test Facebook's Doomsday scenario against your users to determine their loyalty to your application.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && karma start --single-run && npm run build-example && npm run build-lib
scripts.clean: rm -f example/bundle.js example/bundle.js.map && rm -rf lib && mkdir lib
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git rebase origin/master --force-rebase && npm run build && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --force && git checkout master

author: Duncan Beaton <dunckr@gmail.com>
